CustomField.description: The name of the jurisdiction (e.g., "Canada", "Seattle", "Austin_Texas"). This will be used in Apex to retrieve the appropriate Jurisdiction Rule. For simplicity, please refrain from using spaces, commas or special characters. For example `Austin_Texas` is used instead of `Austin, Texas`.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The name of the jurisdiction, without spaces or commas (e.g., "Canada", "Seattle", "Austin_Texas"). This will allow the logic to retrieve the applicable role.
CustomField.label: Jurisdiction Name
